Kadapa.title: Kadapa
Kadapa.byline: Kadapa, also called Cuddapah, is a city of 345,000 people (2011) in the state of Andhra Pradesh in India, 261 km from Chennai.

Kadyny.title: Kadyny
Kadyny.byline: Kadyny is a village in Pomorskie in Poland.

Kaduna.title: Kaduna
Kaduna.byline: Kaduna is the capital of Kaduna State in North West Nigeria.
